text.0: speak forth three words the words which light precedeth which milk this udder that produceth nectar.
text.1: quickly made manifest the bull hath bellowed engendering the germ of plants the infant.
text.2: giver of growth to plants the god who ruleth over the waters and all moving creatures.
text.3: vouchsafe us triple shelter for our refuge and threefold light to succour and befriend us.
text.4: now he is sterile now begetteth offspring even as he willeth doth he change his figure.
text.5: the fathers genial flow bedews the mother therewith the sire therewith the son is nourished.
text.6: in him all living creatures have their being and the three heavens with triplyflowing waters.
text.7: three reservoirs that sprinkle down their treasure shed their sweet streams around him with a murmur.
text.8: may this my song to sovran lord parjanya come near unto his heart and give him pleasure.
text.9: may we obtain the showers that bring enjoyment and godprotected plants with goodly fruitage.
text.10: he is the bull of all and their impregner he holds the life of all things fixed and moving.
text.11: may this rite save me till my hundredth autumn preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
